notes: Wallpaper: 800x480 JPG/PNG recommended. Touch screen model.

configurable_options.name: phone_setting.keyboard_lock.type
configurable_options.label: Lock Type
configurable_options.description: Set lock type: 0-Lock all keys; 1-Lock all except dial pad

configurable_options.name: phone_setting.keyboard_lock.password
configurable_options.label: Unlock PIN
configurable_options.description: Define the unlock PIN (up to 15 characters)

configurable_options.name: softkey.1.enable
configurable_options.label: Enable Menu Softkey
configurable_options.description: Hide the "Menu" softkey entirely to prevent tampering

configurable_options.name: static.security.admin_password
configurable_options.label: Admin Password
configurable_options.description: Change default admin password for web/phone interface

configurable_options.name: static.network.web_server.enable
configurable_options.label: Enable Web Interface
configurable_options.description: Disable the web interface for total lockdown (requires factory reset to re-enable)

configurable_options.name: static.zero_touch.enable
configurable_options.label: Enable Zero Touch
configurable_options.description: Disable Zero Touch (prevents kids from accidentally triggering provisioning at boot)

configurable_options.name: phone_setting.backgrounds
configurable_options.label: Custom Wallpaper URL
configurable_options.description: Set a custom wallpaper (URL must be accessible by the phone)

configurable_options.name: account.1.display_name
configurable_options.label: Display Name
configurable_options.description: Set the phone's display name (appears on screen)

configurable_options.name: account.1.hotline_number
configurable_options.label: Hotline Number
configurable_options.description: Enable Hotline / Hot Dialing for Account 1

configurable_options.name: account.1.hotline_delay
configurable_options.label: Hotline Delay
configurable_options.description: Delay before dialing (0 = immediate, 4 = wait 4 seconds)

configurable_options.name: phone_setting.inter_digit_timer
configurable_options.label: Inter Digit Timer
configurable_options.description: Reduce wait time after last digit is pressed before dialing automatically
